interestsHTML:
Naturally curious, i hate seeing something i cannot understand, specially in science and technology.
That's why i love acquiring new knowledges in various fields from engineer to sciology or psychology.

I do my technological watch on development, Network, IoT and algorithms via blogs/forums (Reddit, web.dev, medium), podcasts and specialized websites(ZDNet, ArsTechnica, Ginjfo).
When i have some time, i try to attend forums to meet other passionates : FIC, Hackfest, Saglac IO, Le Hack or CCC.
Otherwise, i like challenging myself (Battle Dev, OverTheWire, Root-me) or learning online (MOOC ANSSI, Unity Learn, etc.).

Apart from development and computer linked activities, i love hiking in parcs or practise indoor sports : handball / volleyball / LaserGame / badminton.
